verses.1: Topa phat un. Topaʼ nasemte aw, phat un. Topaʼ min phat un.
verses.2: Topaʼ min in tu a kipanin thupha ngah tawntung tahen.
verses.3: Nisuahna pan nitumna dongin Topaʼ min phat ding ahi hi.
verses.4: Topa in minam khempeuh tungah uk a, ama minthanna vantung sangin sang zaw hi.
verses.5: A sangna munah a tu, vantung le leitung a hong en suk Topa, eiteʼ Pasian pen kua tawh kibang ahi hiam?
verses.7: Amah in leivui panin mizawngte laam to-in, ninphual panin mi cimawhte le a lungkhamte dom to a,
verses.8: uliante tawh kikhawl sakin ama miteʼ ulianin a bawl hi.
verses.9: Amah in tasel numei tungah ta guan a, ta a nei nu a lungdamin a bawl hi. Topa phat un.
